page.title: 14The Councillor - 1
page.content:
{Mrs.L.Errington}is a{Hampshire {County Councillor}and a{New Forest {District Councillor.}
Mrs.Errington is a very jolly lady, her house is in the middle of a wood and she has two dogs, Tessa and Bena. In the Second World War, Mrs.Erring- ton was in the{Women's Royal Air {Force.}Since then she has served for many years on local councils and like her father, Mrs.Errington became a County Councillor. That was in 1974. On the County Council she represents {Ringwood, North}and{South, Bisterne} and{Bransgore}and she enjoys the work. She meets all sorts of people "from dustmen to dukes" but does get angry sometimes. Mrs. Errington is currently angry because{Ringwood}is being described as the area's untidiest town.
